choice: Choose one of the following breakfast sandwiches:

items.title: THE SEXY SAUSAGE
items.description: Smoked sausage, orange marmalade, sriracha mustard, sourdough

items.title: THE MCBUTTER
items.description: Thick-cut bacon, egg, cheddar, hashbrown, served as a burrito

items.title: STEAK EXPLOSION
items.description: Grilled steak, pimento cheese, tomato jam, scratch-made biscuit

items.title: WARM FRUIT BOWL
items.description: w/ sweet vanilla glaze and granola

items.title: CREAMY CHEESE GRITS
items.description: w/ aged cheddar and roasted garlic

items.title: DRINKS
items.description: Add Honeybee coffee and OJ for $2/person
